articles.title: James Webb telescope: Amazing images show the Universe as never before - BBC
articles.description: It's a year since the James Webb telescope launched, and we've marvelled at its pictures ever since.
articles.content:
It was the $10bn gift to the world. A machine that would show us our place in the Universe.
The James Webb Space Telescope was launched exactly a year ago, on Christmas Day. It had taken three decad… [+4150 chars]

articles.title: NASA Explores a Winter Wonderland on Mars – Otherworldly Holiday Scene With Cube-Shaped Snow - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Cube-shaped snow, icy landscapes, and frost are all part of the Red Planet’s coldest season. When winter comes to Mars, the surface is transformed into a truly otherworldly holiday scene. Snow, ice, and frost accompany the season’s sub-zero temperatures. Some…
articles.content:
ByJet Propulsion LaboratoryDecember 24, 2022

articles.title: Scientists find secret to how glass frogs turn transparent - BBC
articles.description: Scientists discover the glass frog's "superpower" in its ability to pool blood to turn see-through.
articles.content:
A frog that turns itself mostly transparent while sleeping may hold clues for understanding blood clotting in humans.
Scientists have long known about the glass frog but did not understand how it ma… [+2487 chars]

articles.author: Ian Randall
articles.title: Russia poised to send rescue ship to ISS after cosmonauts stranded with capsule leak - Express
articles.description: Engineers are currently evaluating whether the MS-22 capsule is safe to bring its crew back to Earth - or whether it will need to be sent back empty and a replacement launched.
